scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w graphql -w ../backend-modules -w src -w lib -w modules -w .env -w package.json -w server.js -w index.js index.js
scripts.db:reset:seed: yarn run db:reset && yarn run db:seed:users && yarn run db:seed:crowdfundings
scripts.db:reset: node script/db-migrate-all.js reset && node script/db-migrate-all.js up
scripts.translations: yarn run translations:local && yarn run translations:crowdfunding
scripts.link:backend-modules: yarn link apollo-modules-node && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-auth && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-base && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-documents && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-mail && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-translate && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-scalars && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-scripts && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-redirections && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-assets && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-github
scripts.unlink:backend-modules: yarn unlink apollo-modules-node && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-auth && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-base && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-documents && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-mail && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-translate && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-scalars && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-scripts && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-redirections && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-assets && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-github
scripts.launch: yarn run db:migrate:up && node script/launch/activateMemberships.js && node script/launch/add_launch_data.js
scripts.test:prepare: dropdb --if-exists republik-test && createdb republik-test && NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env yarn run db:reset:seed
scripts.test:travis: yarn run test:prepare && FORCE_TEST_END=true istanbul cover tape "__tests__/**/*.test.js" --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.test:watch: yarn run test:prepare && NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env nodemon --exec 'tape "__tests__/**/*.test.js"' | tap-diff
scripts.test: yarn run test:prepare && NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env FORCE_TEST_END=true istanbul cover tape "__tests__/**/*.test.js" | tap-diff
